item id [id]: 417

protection, head [prothead]: 19
morale bonus [morale]: +4
inspirational leadership [inspirational]: +2
awe [awe]: +1

(unremovable [cursed], quickness [quick], lucky [luck], won't-be-picked-up [nofind])

Item cannot be forged.

The winner of the arena death match may receive this helmet. The Champion will have to defend this prize in upcoming death matches until it finally passes along to a new Champion.
